nodes.goal: Solve the system of equations for variable r.
nodes.plan: Use substitution or elimination method to solve the two equations simultaneously.

nodes.goal: Isolate c in one of the equations.
nodes.plan: Choose either equation and rearrange to express c in terms of r.

nodes.goal: Substitute the expression for c into the other equation and solve for r.
nodes.plan: Replace c in the second equation with the expression found from the first equation.
